title: 820-3476 No green light and ppbus 12.3
message:
Hello 
Im working on a 820-3476 board and cant understand whats wrong with it. Have replaced SMC with no change. Some measurements 

PP3V42_G3H 3.43V
ppbus_g3h .   12.3v
SMC_BC_ACOK 3.4v
SMC_BC_ACOK_VCC 3.4v
ADAPTER_SENSE 2.84v
SYS_ONEWIRE 2.85v

As always Im using genuine charger and tried known good dc in board

title: 820-3476 No green light and ppbus 12.3
message:
solved it so far. Pad under R5100 was gone replaced and now I have green and orange light and ppbus are 12.6 volts. 

Still no fan spin but one step closer

title: 820-3476 No green light and ppbus 12.3
message:
Do you get 3V3_S5/SUS?
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L (supposed to be high) and check for reaction at PM_PWRBTN_L and PM_SLP_Sx_L signals.

title: 820-3476 No green light and ppbus 12.3
message: One more to the donor board pile. 3v3_s5 short and CPU heats up
